alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Laurens; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 05 at 4:00PM EDT until April 05 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Laurens County in central Georgia... North central Pulaski County in central Georgia... Bleckley County in central Georgia... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 400 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Pulaski State Prison, or near Hawkinsville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Cochran, Dudley, Montrose, Royal, Coley Station, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Paulk, Goldsboro, Rebie, Cary and Porter. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
